Class MergedFile

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.Domain.Entity
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.Domain.dll

Implementation of merged file model.

Inheritance: BaseItem -> BaseDirectory -> MdFile -> MergedFile
Implements: IComparable<T>, IDirectory, IEditFile, IItem, IMergedFile 

public sealed class MergedFile : MdFile, IComparable<BaseDirectory>, IMergedFile, IEditFile, IDirectory, IItem

IComparable<T>

IMergedFile

MergedFile(int, string?, DateTime?, DateTime, string, TableOfContents, string?, string?, int)

Sets all properties accordingly.

public MergedFile(int id, string? path, DateTime? mergeDate, DateTime modifiedDate, string newLineStyle, TableOfContents tableOfContents, string? title, string? tOCHeader, int userId)

Parameters

id int

Identification number of item.

path string

Absolute path to .md file, where merged file will be created.

mergeDate DateTime?

Date and time of last creation of merged file associated with this instance or null if file wasn't created yet.

modifiedDate DateTime

Date and time of last modification of this entity.

newLineStyle string

String that will be placed at the end of each line of text placed in created merged file and is treated as a newline character.

tableOfContents TableOfContents

Type of table of contents that will be placed at the beginning of created merged file.

title string

Text that will be placed as first line of created merged file. Title (header) of the file.

tOCHeader string

Text that will be placed in created merged file in the line below title and before content of table of contents.

userId int

Identification number of User associated with this instance.

Remarks

No evaluation or adjusting is performed, so use it only for previously checked and adjusted data, for example from database.

See Also

Properties

MergeDate

Last date and time of creating the merged file. If merged file wasn't created yet, it is set to null.

public DateTime? MergeDate { get; set; }

Property Value

DateTime?

By default it is set to null.

NewLineStyle

String that will be put at the end of each line of text in created merged file.

public string NewLineStyle { get; set; }

Property Value

string

By default it is set to "\n" , but it can by any string.

TOCHeader

Header placed in the merged file before the table of contents content.

public string? TOCHeader { get; set; }

Property Value

string

By default it is set to "## Spis treści" (second level header with "Spis treści" text).
